string.name: desc
string.value: This mystical camouflage allows the user to blend into his or her surroundings. [Gives +100 Avoidability for 5 minutes.]

string.name: desc
string.value: A mixture made from an ancient Taru shaman recipe. Instills warriors with the primal strength of the Jungle Spirit. [Gives +35 Weapon Attack, +10 Accuracy for 20 minutes.]

string.value: Special incense used by ancient Taru shamans for communion rituals with the Jungle Spirit. [Gives +90 Magic Attack for 20 minutes.]

string.name: desc
string.value: A delicious natural beverage made from a secret blend of jungle fruits, flowers, roots, and vines. The perfect thing to fuel a Taru brave through a long jungle trek! [Restores 1000 HP and 2000 MP.]

string.name: desc
string.value: 为了纪念冒险岛4周年，在世界\n各地撒下的寻宝便签，便签里写\n着奖品的名字

string.value: A delicious chocolate cupcake with vanilla cream filling. One taste and you'll be hooked! [Restores 300 HP & MP, and gives +30 Accuracy, +30 Speed, and +30 Jump for 3 minutes.]

string.name: desc
string.value: A rare, tasty dessert. Known as the 'Warrior's Dessert' to some and the 'Fattening Treat' to others. [Gives +30 Weapon Attack for 3 minutes.]

string.name: desc

string.name: name
string.value: 克拉齐亚召唤袋-堕落军团

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value:
能够召唤出来自克拉齐亚的强大
怪物的神秘黑色麻袋。胆小者慎
用！大脚怪打起架来可是不分敌
我的！

string.name: desc
string.value: 可以召唤打豆豆怪物1-A的包裹

string.name: desc
string.value: 召唤绿水灵、猪猪、蘑菇仔、蓝\n水灵、三眼章鱼、绿蘑菇、刺蘑\n菇各3只。

string.name: desc
string.value: 召唤兔子鼓手、鳄鱼、玩具白鼠\n、星光精灵、小幽灵、小企鹅王\n各3只。

string.name: desc
string.value: 召唤发条熊猫、机器章鱼王、红\n螃蟹、僵尸猴、黄色战斗机、空\n军雀各3只。

string.name: desc
string.value: 召唤木马士兵、积木王、大幽灵\n、外星人元帅、混种石头人各3\n只。

string.name: desc
string.value: 召唤蘑菇王、赤龙、冰龙、大恶\n灵附身的娃娃、黑大雪人各3只\n。

string.name: desc
string.value: 召唤长枪牛魔王、蓝色鬼怪、黑\n色飞狮、狼人、贝贝各3只。

string.name: desc
string.value: 召唤白狼人、恶灵附身的娃娃、\n大海贼王、巫婆各3只。

string.name: desc
string.value: 召唤火狗5只、蝙蝠怪2只、蝙\n蝠魔1只。

string.name: desc
string.value: 召唤怪物入侵第1~~第3阶段的\n怪物各1只。

string.name: desc
string.value: 召唤怪物入侵第4~~第7阶段的\n怪物各1只。

string.value: A marble that contains poisoned monsters. Use it to bring out the poisoned monster from the marble.

string.name: desc
string.value: 宠物喜欢的饲料，增加饱满感\n30，人不能吃

string.name: desc
string.value: 用优质材料制造的饲料，宠物可\n吃。

string.name: desc
string.value: 双击可以给别的角色新年贺卡。

string.name: desc
string.value: 可以判断是否在使用非法程序的\n道具。对正在攻击怪物的玩家才\n可以使用

string.name: desc
string.value: 如水晶雕像的神奇力量融入体内\n，将会变身。此神奇的魔法力量\n会持续一个小时。

string.name: desc
string.value: 如水晶雕像的神奇力量融入体内\n，将会变身。此神奇的魔法力量\n会持续一个小时。

string.name: desc
string.value: 如水晶雕像的神奇力量融入体内\n，将会变身。此神奇的魔法力量\n会持续一个小时。

string.name: desc
string.value: 摩伊拉所制作的秘药，服用后可\n在一段时间内变身成为蜥蜴龙族\n的样貌。

string.name: desc
string.value: 能变成警卫提干的样子的变身药\n水。

string.name: desc
string.value: 可以在红蜗牛王身上得到的特别\n的壳儿。据说拥有实现他人愿望\n的魔力……

string.name: desc
string.value: 忽然觉得身体很轻，身体已经飘\n在空中了。啊！是幽灵！

string.name: desc
string.value: 不知以什么制成的，长得像幽灵\n的糖果。据说有特别的能力。

string.name: desc
string.value:
虽然很久以前被苏菲莉亚丢弃，
再次被名匠赋予生命的人偶。抚
摸它的头时，可以变身成为苏菲
莉亚三分钟。
#c变身维持3分钟，3分钟前无法
任意取消#

string.name: desc
string.value: 喝下药水的瞬间可以变身为超人\n。

string.name: desc
string.value: 喝下药水的瞬间可以变身为超人\n。

string.name: desc
string.value: 变身成为小巧可爱的老鼠。

string.name: desc
string.value: 因年老的矮人族克隆的秘术暂时\n变成龙的造型。可以飞向天空。

string.name: desc
string.value: A picture given by Cody of himself. I get a feeling something fun will happen when I use it.

string.name: desc
string.value: A picture of a delicious cake that Cody gave as a gift. I get a feeling something funny with happen when I use it.

string.name: desc
string.value: 喝掉药水的瞬间会变成什么模样\n谁都不知道。

string.name: desc
string.value: 双击的话可使对方变身的神秘药\n水，会变成什么模样谁都不知道\n。

string.name: desc
string.value: 戒指盒里放着月长石订婚戒指。\n在求婚时可以使用的戒指盒。

string.name: desc
string.value: 戒指盒里放着闪耀新星订婚戒指\n。在求婚时可以使用的戒指盒。

string.name: desc
string.value: 戒指盒里放着金心订婚戒指。在\n求婚时可以使用的戒指盒。

string.name: desc
string.value: 戒指盒里放着银翼订婚戒指。在\n求婚时可以使用的戒指盒。

string.name: desc
string.value: 可以恢复被驯服的怪物的疲倦值\n30

string.name: desc
string.value: 坎特制作的费洛蒙香水，它可以\n驯服在下一个村落里的野猪。

string.name: desc
string.value: 拥有宝石装饰的袋子。拥有神秘\n的力量，双击的话，可以抓住徘\n徊在周围的幽灵。

string.name: desc
string.value: 吸收怪兽力量时变为宝石的，特\n殊的炼金术道具。里面是半透明\n的。

string.name: desc
string.value: 可以驯服迷路的圣诞鹿的克里夫\n的魔法杖。

string.name: desc
string.value: 把中毒的怪物装进去，使其得到\n净化的特殊的魔法之珠。

string.name: desc
string.value: A special magic marble that can contain a poisoned monster on the 1st floor.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special magic marble that can contain a poisoned monster on the 2nd floor.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value:
装有熔岩的瓶子，瓶子里的熔岩
还在翻滚。喝了这瓶熔岩，火花
会渗透到体内，可以修炼火凤球
。

string.name: desc
string.value: 制造乌云的机器，造出了乌云就\n可以修炼成烟雾弹。

string.name: desc
string.value: 放在像紧握的拳头模样的瓶子里\n的觉醒剂，喝了可以提高勇士的\n意志。

string.value: 答对冒险骑士团有关的问题，可\n以获得幸运。点击即可进行挑战\n。

string.name: desc
string.value: This firecracker has been specially made to celebrate July 4th, 1776, our Independence Day. For 10 minutes, Speed and Jump increase by 5.

string.name: desc
string.value: This firecracker has been specially made to celebrate July 4th, 1776, our Independence Day. For 10 minutes, Attack and Magic increase by 5.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: 用生长在圣地的药草制作的药水\n，专为高级职业制作\n恢复HP50

string.name: desc
string.value: 用生长在圣地的药草制作的药水\n，专为高级职业制作\n恢复MP100

string.name: desc
string.value: 渔网里好像捞到了什么。双击可\n以确认上面的东西。

string.name: desc
string.value: 吞下了什么东西的鱼。双击可以\n确认肚子里的东西。

string.name: desc
string.value: 受到净化的森林中降下的金色光\n雨的影响，移动速度和跳跃力提\n高了。

string.name: desc
string.value: 用牛肉和香菇，以及桔梗串在一\n起制成的著名小吃\nHP和MP恢复大约1500

string.name: desc
string.value: A crystal piece that resembles Blue Ribbon Pig. When used, the crystal will melt into the body, and its mythical power will transform the user into Blue Ribbon Pig. This mythical power will last for an hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: 不知道会召唤出什么怪物，但据\n卡珊德拉说可能会召唤出从未见\n过的怪物

string.name: desc
string.value: 召唤炸弹，夺走羊身上的毛。

string.name: desc
string.value: 种下有刺的蔷薇，阻止狼接近。

string.name: desc
string.value: 进入童话，变身成杰佩托。虽然\n身体有点笨重，但试着和队员们\n一起离开迷宫吧。

string.name: desc
string.value: 水晶雕像的神秘力量融入体内之\n后，我已经不再是自己了。

string.name: desc
string.value: 变身为企鹅普里普里的样子，效\n果持续60分钟

string.name: desc
string.value: 写满了看不懂的文字。#c双击可以\n开始执行任务。#

string.name: desc
string.value: 指向钻石王老五宝物岛位置的黄\n金罗盘。 #c双击#后可以移动到宝物岛。

string.name: desc
string.value: 含有小冒险家的香味的香水。#c双\n击#可以发出香味，骗过怪物。

string.name: desc
string.value: 不知道年份的遗物。#c双击可以确\n认#年份。

string.name: desc
string.value: 召唤工作员。运营员活动用

string.name: desc
string.value: 解散工作员。运营员活动用

string.name: desc
string.value:
在马来西亚非常受欢迎的料理。
鸡肉片与咖喱及牛奶的完美结合
非常香甜可口
恢复HP4000

string.name: desc
string.value:
很著名的马来传统食物。含有米
粉，与酸酐，豆干，豆芽，鸡蛋
和花生
恢复4000MP

string.name: desc
string.value:
这道著名的佳肴，含有丰富的甜
辣花生酱，黄瓜，虾膏，豆芽，
和白萝卜
恢复1000HP及1000MP

string.name: desc
string.value: 马来风味的辛辣料理\n10分钟内提高武器的物理攻击力\n和魔法力+8

string.name: desc
string.value: 这些小甜点，是马来族派队的最\n爱，适合饮茶配合\n30分钟内速度+10

string.name: desc
string.value: A stinky dish made with Cursed Frog Eggs. Increases 400 HP if eaten.

string.name: desc
string.value: A non-alcoholic wine made by the Witch using Cursed Cat Spittle. Increases 200 MP when consumed.

string.name: desc
string.value: A creepy and slimy Canape that the Witch has made for you. Increases Weapon ATT and Weapon DEF +15 for 15 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A suspiciously sharp-tasting Kabab that the Witch has made for you. Increases Magic ATT And Magic DEF +15 for 15 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: The Witch's wrap dish that fills your mouth with the aroma of the swamp with each bite. Increases Weapon ATT and Weapon DEF +25 for 15 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A rough leather steak that the Witch has carefully grilled for you. Increases Magic ATT And Magic Defense +25 for 15 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: The Witch's special stew that gives off a sour stink. Increases Weapon and Magic ATT +40, Weapons and Magic DEF +100, and Speed and Jump +15 for 15 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A scroll that, depending on chance, will either improve or worsen the Talking Witch Hat or Broomstick obtained from the Witch.

string.name: desc
string.value: A scroll that, depending on chance, will either improve or worsen the Witch's Belts obtained from the Witch.

string.name: desc
string.value: A sack that Cassandra gave you as a gift. On it appears a note that reads "Open with Friends."

string.name: desc
string.value: An offensive-looking leech costume. Can be worn to trick your friends.

string.name: desc
string.value: A huge roasted turkey leg. It's so big that it seems like it would take all day to finish eating.\n[Gives +30 Physical Attack for 3 minutes]

string.name: desc
string.value: 用生长在里恩岛上的药草制作而\n成的药水\n恢复HP100

string.name: desc

string.name: desc

。

string.name: desc
string.value:
Cures the Abnormal Statuses:
Poison
Seal
Miss
Weakness
Curse
Only usable when fighting Crumbling Zakum (Easy Mode).

string.name: desc
string.value: Allows you to recover from any abnormal state.

string.name: desc
string.value: Alters equipment for better or worse stats than the Chaos Scroll. Some stats are not affected.

string.name: desc
string.value: Alters equipment for better or worse. Cannot be used on Cash items. Some stats are not affected.

string.name: desc
string.value:
神奇的北斗卫星指导书。传说是
由该书封面上的冒险岛勇士昨日
小睡流传下来的，据说集齐7本
以后会有意想不到的事情发生，
是什么呢？蹦下咔啦咔
